alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Montgomery County through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Uvalda, or 9 miles southeast of Mount Vernon, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, Uvalda and Alston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
